name: Stardust Sandwich
description:
Stardust Sandwich

Enter Ensign Wilhelm, a scheming, self-absorbed, good for nothing crewman aboard the Ergo. When the Commander's secret sandwich goes missing, Wilhelm finds himself in between a rock and the airlock as he heads an unofficial investigation to find the hungry culprit. He'll rely on his roguish wits and spineless persistence to evade the grim fate that follows his failure.

Features
  • Custom Music
  • Custom Sound FX
  • Cast of 6 main characters
  • Mini-games galore
  • Made in RPG Maker MV
